title: Jon Hamm is single, the world rejoices
text: He may have had more than his fair share of demons, and something of a commitment problem – but for many viewers, Man Men's suave ad man Don Draper, played by actor Jon Hamm, was the epitome of masculine cool. The AMC series came to an end earlier this year, after seven seasons, but Draper's pervasive influence – and Hamm's own charms – are clearly still making themselves felt. When the actor announced on Monday that that he had split from his partner of 18 years, actress Jennifer Westfeldt , fans were quick to celebrate "Don's" new single status. Several tweeters even jokingly offered to trade in their current partners, in return for the handsome US star. Just read Jon Hamm is single and screamed "ye " so loud alone in my apartment. Does anyone have a life I can borrow? — Lauren Levine (@lifewithlauren1) September 7, 2015 Jon Hamm is single the sun is setting on a new world today — Kate Newton (@katenewton18) September 7, 2015 Dear Jon Hamm: So hey- You're single and my fingers were crossed during my wedding vows, so HMU if you like fat asses & curry. Love, Anita — Bianca LaVagina (@AnitaHelmet) September 8, 2015 My wife's "Jon Hamm is single" Google alert just went off. — Andrew Hibbard (@andrewhibbard) September 7, 2015 Heard screams from the living room. Ran in to find wife and sister-in-law rejoicing at the news Jon Hamm is single. #norespect — Aaron Nagler (@AaronNagler) September 8, 2015 I always feel sorry for my married friends that don't get to live in the land of delusion upon a celebrity breakup: JON HAMM IS SINGLE!!!! — Lyndsey Horton (@elleHorton) September 7, 2015 JON HAMM IS SINGLE MY DAY HAS BEEN MADE — ?melanie.? (@MazzMelanie) September 8, 2015 Jon Hamm is single. I tried to dump my boyfriend. He didn't think it was funny. — Melissa Mercieca (@melissamercieca) September 8, 2015 Sadly, the actor, who is 44, appears to have had something of a troubled year. In March, he announced that he had attended a month-long rehab programme for alcohol addiction. While the reasons for his split from Westfeldt remain unknown, the couple released a joint statement to People Magazine , speaking of their "great sadness" at the decision.. With great sadness, we have decided to separate, after 18 years of love and shared history," they said. "We will continue to be supportive of each other in every way possible moving forward."
